message.content:
{
  "weekly_summary": "Mid/small caps stayed constructive. Leadership rotated into pharma (Laurus, Biocon, Lupin), exchanges/depositories (BSE, CDSL), and capital goods (Voltas, BHEL). PSU metals coiled (SAIL near 145.2 trigger). NBFCs were choppy; manage LTF concentration with a tight trail. We rotate out of weak utilities (NHPC) into stronger momentum themes and rebalance risk.",
  "trades": [
    {
      "action": "sell",
      "symbol": "NHPC",
      "shares": 30,
      "amount": 2409.0,
      "reason": "Exit laggard; below 82.5 and weak within 80–83 range. Reallocate to higher-RS themes."
    },
    {
      "action": "sell",
      "symbol": "LTF",
      "shares": 6,
      "amount": 1764.9,
      "reason": "Trim concentration (~21% -> ~15%) and trail risk while it remains below 300; line-in-sand near 289."
    },
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "CDSL",
      "shares": 1,
      "amount": 1625.8,
      "reason": "Add within strong exchange/depository theme; holding >1600. Risk marker ~1515."
    },
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "SAIL",
      "shares": 10,
      "amount": 1419.9,
      "reason": "Accumulate in 140–142 coil ahead of 145.2 breakout; initial risk to ~137.5."
    },
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "NBCC",
      "shares": 10,
      "amount": 1141.4,
      "reason": "High-volume momentum; buy-the-dip near 111–114 with stop ~107.5. Diversifies away from NBFC risk."
    }
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 167.8,
    "total_value": 27473.5,
    "holdings_count": 8,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 units",
      "LTF: 14 units",
      "BEL: 10 units",
      "LAURUSLABS: 3 units",
      "BHEL: 10 units",
      "SAIL: 30 units",
      "CDSL: 3 units",
      "NBCC: 10 units"
    ],
    "weekly_pnl": "-0.1%"
  },
  "screening_changes": [
    "Remove IDEA: speculative penny behavior and outsized volatility; not aligned with risk profile.",
    "Remove EMCURE: weak RS and repeated failed attempts near 1400; prefer clearer pharma leaders.",
    "Remove GODIGIT: range-bound near 350 with low edge; drop to reduce list clutter."
  ]
}
